column1: 10 pts - Great job identifying the production function as a suitable candidate for implementing Scrum/Sprint methodologies and providing a clear explanation of how it could operate within this function. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job in explaining the Scrum/Sprint and Kanban methodologies for the production and distribution functions. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the benefits of Scrum/Sprint and Kanban for different functions, but the explanation of why Kanban is a poor fit for the chosen function could be clearer. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Identified business function is somewhat unlikely to benefit from kanban.

Comment: Good effort in identifying the distribution function for kanban implementation, but the production function might have been a better fit. Keep up the good work!
10 pts - Some vagueness in description, but largely OK. Good effort in explaining the use of Kanban for Distribution, but could be more specific in certain areas. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Complete and clear description of poor fit

Great job explaining why the Scrum/Sprint method may not be the best fit for the Distribution process. Keep up the good work!
5 pts - You've identified anchoring bias as a relevant issue for Jackson's decision-making and provided clear suggestions to avoid it. Great job!

8 pts - Right idea for definition, but some vagueness or illogic. 

Your definition of anchoring bias is mostly correct, but it could be clearer and more concise. Keep practicing and refining your explanations.

12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job identifying the anchoring bias and providing a detailed explanation of its potential impact on Jackson's decision-making process. Keep up the good work!
8/10 - Good job on providing a clear description of possible steps and actions. However, some details could be further elaborated to enhance the understanding of the process. Keep up the good work!
